name: MeditatewithMindfulnessBellSoundMeditation
0:
”Alexa, ask mindfulness bell to play big bell”
”Alexa, use mindfulness bell to ring small bell”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mindfulness bell
des:
Regardless if you follow the Mr. S.N. Goenka's teaching of anapana meditation, vipassana meditation (also known as insight meditation) and loving kindness meditation (metta bhavana), or Thich Nhat Hanh (of Plum Village Tradition)'s teaching of mindfulness meditation, or even if you just want to experience the bliss of hearing an awakening bell sound, you should try this Alexa skill.

This skill is created by a Buddhist practitioner for free to celebrate Wesak Day (or Vesak Day, Buddha Jayanti, Buddha Purnima and Buddha Day) but you don't have to be a Buddhist to enjoy this skill. After spending countless hours learning how to build this Alexa skill, it is now available to people like you. Hope you enjoy the peaceful sound of bell.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
